$comment: Copy this to .cursor/mcp.json for auto-start MCP servers. All 'command' type servers auto-start via stdio. SSE/HTTP types require central-mcp running first.

central-filesystem.$comment: Auto-start: Filesystem server. Replace <YOUR_ALLOWED_DIR> with allowed paths

central-everything.$comment: Auto-start: MCP demo/test server with all capabilities

central-fake-qdrant.$comment: Auto-start: Fake Qdrant vector DB with optional HTTP shim on port 6333

central-local-embeddings.$comment: Auto-start: Local/offline text embeddings using Transformers.js (model cached in ./model-cache)

central-docsearch.$comment: Auto-start: Document search with local embeddings (offline-first, no API key required)
